title: Just so you know
content: In case you are not aware, COVID-19 was not the first pandemic. In 1918, it was the type of flu behind the influenza pandemic, sometimes called the Spanish flu (though it didn’t actually from come Spain).
name: Merrill Streep

title: Daily Inspiration
content: Make everyday count. Live each day as if it is your last day, for it may well be!
name: Just See

title: Practical Living
content: To look out for yourself only is not healthy.  Caring about other people and their well being builds character in you and makes you a better person. Let someone know that you care.
name: Justin Oakley

title: Encouragement
content: A dream fulfilled enriches your life and is a witness to others
name: Lisa Manelly

title: Encouragement
content: Look for the good in everyone, so that your good will be exposed
name: Lisa Manelly

title: Is it for real?
content: A picture is worth a thousand words, especially when the words are empty.
name: William Shakespear

title: You are strong
content: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
name: William Shakespear

title: You are victorious
content: or everyone born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world, even our faith.
name: William Shakespear

title: You are victorious
content: or everyone born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world, even our faith.
name: William Shakespear

title: You are free
content: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not let yourselves be burdened again by a yoke of slavery.
name: William Shakespear

title: You are beloved
content: Therefore, as God’s chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience.
name: William Shakespear

title: You are chosen
content: Therefore, as God’s chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience.
name: John Doe

title: You are blessed
content: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms with every spiritual blessing in Christ.
name: John Doe

title: You are protected
content: The angel of the Lord encamps around those who fear him, and he delivers them.
name: John Doe

title: Is it for real?
content: Learning is fun, especially when you actually understand what you are doing.
name: Mary Smith

title: Is it for real?
content: A picture is worth a thousand words, especially when the words are empty.

title: Is it for real?
content: Whoever said that sticks and stones may break my bones but talk will never hurt, must have never been slandered before.
name: Mary Smith

content: Whoever said that sticks and stones may break my bones but talk will never hurt, must have never been slandered before.

title: Encouragement
content: Excellence is a virtue that should be desired
name: Tony Taylor

title: Encouragement
content: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
name: Tony Taylor

title: Encouragement
content: Everyone is beautiful, in their own way
name: Tony Taylor

title: Encouragement
content: Expect a miracle, everyday.
name: Tony Taylor

title: God and you
content: If you have accepted Jesus into your heart, then you are created in His image and after His likeness.  You have now become a new creation. Welcome to the family!
name: Tony Taylor

title: Encouragement
content: Be the best YOU possible. There is only one You and you are unique, special and wonderfully made.
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: Encouragement
content: Be the best YOU possible. There is only one You and you are unique, special and wonderfully made.
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: Encouragement
content: God knows you by name. He has your name engraved in the palm of His hand.
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: Encouragement
content: This is a season of giving.  What you make happen for others will certain cause blessings to come to you
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: Encouragement
content: If at first, you fail to succeed, try, try, try again
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: You are provided for
content: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: You are never alone
content: Never will I leave you, never will I forsake you.
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: You are loved
content: TFor God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
name: Joslyn Merritt

title: You are Loved
content: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
name: Joslyn Merritt
